introduction.title: Transform your texts for LinkedIn
introduction.description: A simple and powerful editor to style your posts in just a few clicks.

editor.copied_description: The text has been copied to your clipboard.

contribute.title: Contribute to Boldify
contribute.description: You can help us improve Boldify by contributing to the codebase or supporting us with a donation to keep the project free for everyone.

footer.clarityMessage: We use Microsoft Clarity to improve our services. All data is anonymized.
